Headline: Taiwan urges Philippines to lift travel ban on Taiwanese amid coronavirus fear – Manila Bulletin
Text: By Reuters Taiwan urged the Philippines on Tuesday to lift a travel ban on its citizens after Philippine airlines canceled flights to Taiwan following a government ban on all foreigners traveling from the island to help contain the spread of the coronavirus.Ministry spokeswoman Joanne Ou made the comments at a regular news briefing in Taipei, adding that some Taiwanese were stranded at airports in the Philippines after the ban was announced earlier this week.Read more: Cebu Pac, PAL cancel flights to Taipei
